title: Studio Apartment Home on Rittenhouse Square, Package Room, Near Stores
description:
The studio apartment home at 2111 is available for lease at this moment! This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite counters. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has wood floors. This home on the 21st floor features large windows that face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home immediately!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at Sue's Produce Market, Venditore by Giordano, the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Aldi, Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Whole Foods, and Sprouts. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Paper Source, J. Crew, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, The Dr. Martens Store, Bluemercury, Scotch & Soda, Brooklinen, Vince, Urban Outfitters, Theory, L'Occitane en Provence, and Marine Layer. Dine out at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's, Pizzeria Vetri, Restaurant Aleksandar, a.kitchen, The Love, and Via Locusta. Savor a cup of coffee at La Colombe, Gran Caffe L'Aquila, Ultimo, Vibrant, Elixr, Alchemy, and Di Bruno Bros. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen. Try the Rittenhouse Churro at El Merkury! Stroll across the park and then buy a French baguette at Metropolitan Bakery. Relax with a manicure or pedicure at Philly Nails Bar. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Mütter Museum. Shop at the fabulous farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM. There is so much to do in this area!

* Larger laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached valet parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.

* Dishwasher
* Gas stove

title: You Will Find Pure Luxury at the Residences of Dockside
description:
You will find Pure Luxury at The Residences of Dockside right on the waterfront with this amazing Corner unit, NORTH FACING condo with center city views, 2 Garage Parking spots, and storage. This TOTALLY RENOVATED 3 Bedroom, 3 Bathroom condo of nearly 2000 sq ft offers some of the finest elements starting with the highly sought-after open floorplan, pristine hardwood floors throughout, a gourmet kitchen, custom fitted California walk-in closet and is book-ended by terraces and breathtaking views. The expansive Main Bedroom Suite features beautiful hardwood floors, LED lighting, custom sconces, large walk-in his/her California Closet, and a terrace just off the main sleeping area. The Main Bathroom Suite features a tiled shower with angular body sprays & glass doors, a full-length mirror, LED lighting & sconces over the vanity, granite countertops, a tiled vanity wall, and decorative basket weave floor tile. Bedroom #2 is presently being used as a guest room and office space with great natural light and amazing water views with access to a terrace to step away from work for an outdoor breather or just to take in the beautiful days or starlit nights. Bedroom #3 is large in scale, has hardwood floors, large windows overlooking the city, window seating with excellent natural light, and custom overhead lighting, and is just across the hall from full bathroom #2 which also houses a brand new stackable full-sized washer and dryer. The guest Powder Room does not disappoint with its modern design featuring a glass bowl sink, sleek vanity, and decorative tile flooring. The gourmet kitchen features granite counters, marble subway backsplash, under-cabinet lighting, a bar nook, wine rack, brand new sto,ve and a private terrace. The Main Living area is the true definition of a free-flowing, open-floor concept. With continued uniformed hardwood flooring, the combo living area features an in-wall electric fireplace, crown molding with cove lighting, overhead LED lighting, window seating and breathtaking wrap-around views of the waterfront, PA, NJ and the famous Philadelphia skyline. Exit the main living area via sliding glass doors to a large terrace where you can entertain friends and family with views that cannot be replicated elsewhere in the city. Dockside has 24 hour gated security and concierge plus VISITOR PARKING when you need it, a totally renovated clubroom with full kitchen and seating for personal use (can be rented for an event) or to just to change up your scenery. The indoor pool and hot tub is a dream, not to mention the state of the art gym and wrap around outdoor patio with tables and chairs that overlook the water and Center City. With three elevators, dedicated bike room storage, separate owners' storage, shuttle service and walkable to everything waterfront including Spruce Street Harbour Park, Liberty Pointe, Bluecross Riverrink, Independence Seaport Museum, the Chart House, Moshulu, Zahav, Old City, Society Hill and much more you will love city living at its finest. You will also appreciate being close to all major highways and bridges to get in and out of the city and to NJ as well as Philadelphia International Airport. Set up a private tour today.
717 S Columbus Blvd #1201

description:
Truly unique, stunning Fishtown townhouse w/ PARKING for lease! The first level of the home is the garage that spans the length of the home followed by the rear yard that can be used for gardening, relaxing and entertaining. Up the stairs you have the main level of the home that is completely open with massively tall ceilings and incredible natural light. The tiered level has the living and dining space on the lower level and full kitchen with eat in nook on the upper level. The kitchen has been recently remodeled with new countertops and fixtures. The top level features three bedrooms, stackable laundry closet, hall bathroom and a brand new primary bathroom. The primary bathroom is jawdropping with accented barn door, wall to wall mirrors, gorgeous tiling, waterfall shower and free standing tub. Through the primary bedroom is access to the green roof deck. The roof deck is lined with succulents to make it a true "green" roof, has panoramic views of the city, and tons of space for get togethers. Lastly, but perhaps the biggest selling point is the prime location in fishtown right off of Frankford ave and next to Palmer park. The home is just steps away from some of the best dining/restaurants in the city such as Suraya, Wm Mulherin's & sons, Pizzeria Beddia and La Colombe. title: Welcome home! Located in Bella Vista
description:
Welcome home! Located in Bella Vista in the much sought after Meredith catchment this 2 bedroom home is snuggled inside a private gated courtyard directly across from the neighborhood favorite Cianfrani Park. As you enter into the spacious living area accented by beautiful hardwood flooring and the first of two fireplaces you're enveloped with the warm feeling of love that has filled this home. Flowing off the living room of this expanded trinity, the full eat in kitchen is contemporarily designed with a subway tiled back splash, granite countertops, a brightly lit skylight shining down from the second floor, and a unique cut out above the sink allowing for the open flow feel of this wonderful living space. The second floor features the first of two bedrooms continuing with the hardwood flow throughout, your full bathroom bright with light from your second skylight, and the perfect hallway nook accented by that same skylight that shines all the way down to the kitchen. The master bedroom on the third floor features the second fireplace as well as a lighter hard wood finish that seems to draw in all of the natural light. This along with the high slanting ceiling give this room a very open airy feel making it a truly "feel good" space. Off of the master you will find the crown of this jewel of a home in a roof deck perfect for relaxing and enjoying all of the wonderful changing seasons our city has to offer. Take advantage of this amazing opportunity to be a part of a community that truly cares for each other in a home that will truly care for you.

title: Great value in Fairmount! A tree-lined block in the heart of Fairmount
description:
Great value in Fairmount!! A tree-lined block in the heart of Fairmount acts as the idyllic foreground to 1707 Wallace St #2R. This updated 2 bed, 1.5 bath bi-level apartment sits on the top two floors of a 4-unit building. The exterior of the building features a classic red brick facade and detailed cornice trim. Inside the unit, you're greeted by a bright and open living room and dining area with soaring 9ft ceilings, tall windows, and beautiful hardwood floors. There's also a huge storage closet and a powder room. The home's kitchen is fitted with tons of cabinetry space, stainless steel appliances, including a dishwasher, and the in-unit laundry closet. The home's second level has a spacious bedroom, with great closet space, at the front. A full bathroom and another bedroom, ideal for an office or nursery, complete this level. 1707 Wallace St's central Fairmount location is a walker's paradise, earning a WalkScore of 92. The Philadelphia Museum of Art, Kelly Drive, and The Community College of Philadelphia are all within walking distance. Nearby Fairmount Ave and North Broad Street are lined with local shops, gyms, and restaurants, including Bar Hygge, Rybread cafe, SOUTH, and Osteria. Whole Foods, Target, and Wine & Spirits are also close by. Plus, there's easy access to public transportation, I-76, Drexel University, and The University of Penn. title: One-of-a-kind Dramatic Sun-filled Home With Towering Ceilings
description:
One-of-a-kind dramatic sun-filled home with towering ceilings, exposed brick and covered garage parking on a virtually hidden block in the historic Society Hill section of Philadelphia. This home features three levels of living with a massive living room, half bath, dining room and full kitchen conveniently located on the first floor. Following the exposed brick and sun drenched stairs up to the second level opens you to your first two bedrooms, laundry, and first full bathroom. Your master is revealed to you after a long private corridor greeting you with his and hers full bathroom with walk-in closet and tremendous shower room. The third floor features a romantic full floor fourth bedroom option with exposed beams and unprecedented privacy. Those of you who enjoy walkability, shops and a nightlife you can leave at the club will love the accessibility this home offers. Being footsteps away from some of the best restaurants, cafes and farmers markets this home allows you to enjoy the finer things the city has to offer. title: Renovated 1 BR Apt Home on Rittenhouse Square, Guest Suites, Lounge
description:
The home at 315 is available for lease at this moment! This 575 square foot Warhol one bedroom one bathroom apartment home on the 3rd floor features large windows that mainly face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. One window in the living and dining room area faces west for morning shade and afternoon sunshine and has a park view. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has neutral carpet. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home immediately!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Sue's Produce Market, Venditore by Giordano, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Aldi, Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Whole Foods, or Sprouts. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Philadelphia Runner, gorjana, Paper Source, J. Crew, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, The Dr. Martens Store, Brooklinen, Scotch & Soda, Vince, Urban Outfitters, Theory, L'Occitane en Provence, and Marine Layer. Experience fine dining at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, or Pietro's. Savor a cup of coffee at La Colombe, Vibrant, Ultimo, Alchemy, Gran Caffe L'Aquila, Elixr, Di Bruno Bros. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in French ice cream at nearby Van Leeuwen. Stroll across the park and then grab a muffin at Metropolitan Bakery. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Relax with a manicure or pedicure at Philly Nails Bar. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM. There is so much to do in this area!
Community Amenities:
* High-rise building on Rittenhouse Square
* Nightly guest suites for the family and friends of current residents
* Sauna
* Package lockers by Luxer One
* Top-of-the-line fitness center with park view
* 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Bike storage in the attached parking garage
* Elevator building with 24-hour front door attendant and 24-hour concierge at the front desk
* 24/7 maintenance
* Laundry room on every floor
* Larger laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Online resident portal for rent payments, maintenance requests, and more
* Attached valet parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
Apartment Home Features:
* Unfurnished one bedroom one bathroom apartment home on 3rd floor
* Dishwasher
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Disposal
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen countertops
* Renovated bathroom
* Neutral carpet
* Large mainly south-facing windows with Chancellor Street view
* One west-facing window with park view
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)
Wondering if this home is still available? Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com to check if 315 is still listed under the Warhol floor plan! Please make an appointment to tour with Michelle or Gabby using ResMate, our chatbot concierge, on our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com 24/7. We welcome you to tour your new home in person. Live virtual tours in Zoom are also available!
Rittenhouse Claridge
201 South 18th Street
Philadelphia, PA 19103

2-22 month lease terms available!

The sublevel includes 2 bedrooms (1 bedroom with an ensuite bathroom) located on opposite ends, closet space, a slate tiled bathroom with a large stand up shower, a stacked washer/dryer atop hardwood flooring. 2nd bedroom (12’4”x11’8”) located on the front part of the sublevel, includes closet space. 3rd bedroom (12’3”x12’4”) located in the rear of the sublevel as an ensuite bathroom with a tiled stand up shower, as well as, tons of sunlight.

title: Rittenhouse Square Studio Apt Home with City Skyline View, Near Stores
description:
The studio apartment home at 2307 is available for lease at this moment! This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home on the 23rd floor features large windows that face north and have a city skyline view. You may gaze upon skyscrapers like BNY Mellon Center, Comcast Center, One Liberty Place, and Two Liberty Place. This renovated kitchen is nice with its white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. The renovated bathroom tile is white. This home has wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as December 15, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, Di Bruno Bros., Sue's Produce Market, Venditore by Giordano, Reading Terminal Market, Giant Heirloom Market, Aldi, Sprouts, and Whole Foods. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, gorjana, Paper Source, J. Crew, Philadelphia Runner, Allbirds, The Dr. Martens Store, Scotch & Soda, Bluemercury, Brooklinen, Vince, Urban Outfitters, Theory, L'Occitane en Provence, and Marine Layer. Dine out at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, Pietro's, Restaurant Aleksandar, Pizzeria Vetri, a.kitchen, Spice Finch, HipCityVeg, The Love, Via Locusta, Monks' Cafe, Marathon on the Square, Rosy's Taco Bar, and Scarpetta. Savor a cup of coffee at La Colombe, K'Far Cafe, Vibrant, Ultimo, Alchemy, Nook Bakery & Coffee Bar, Elixr, and Di Bruno Bros. Indulge in a decadent Sunday brunch at Green Eggs. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen. Try the Rittenhouse Churro from El Merkury! Stroll across the park and then buy baked goods at Metropolitan Bakery. Relax with a manicure and pedicure at Philly Nails Bar. Catch a show at one of the many nearby theaters. Wander around the Barnes Foundation. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday from 9 AM to 2 PM. There is so much to do in this area!

title: Welcome to this newly renovated 2 bedroom 1 bathroom
description:
Welcome to this newly renovated 2 bedroom 1 bathroom home on a beautiful and quiet block.The living room has a lot of charm with original parquet hardwood floors, fireplace, and mudroom. The kitchen has been completely renovated with new dove gray shaker cabinets, quartz countertops, and stainless steel appliances, and is big enough for a dining table. The backyard is private and great for BBQs and get-togethers. Upstairs find two spacious bedrooms with all new floors. The bathroom is brand new with new tub, subway tile surround, new modern vanity, and new fixtures throughout. The basement has a brand new washer and dryer, plus plenty of storage space. Proximity to 29th Street shopping center and multiple bus lines into Center City. Short distance to Fairmount Park amenities like tennis courts, playgrounds, baseball fields, and recreational areas. Pets allowed with additional monthly fee. Tenants pay all utilities. First/Last/SD due before move-in. Schedule a showing today to make it yours Text me if interested:~(501) 683-81 28
Bienvenido a esta casa recientemente renovada de 2 dormitorios y 1 baño en un bloque hermoso y tranquilo.La sala de estar tiene mucho encanto con pisos de madera de parquet originales, chimenea y recibidor. La cocina ha sido completamente renovada con nuevos gabinetes estilo shaker color gris paloma, encimeras de cuarzo y electrodomésticos de acero inoxidable, y es lo suficientemente grande para una mesa de comedor. El patio trasero es privado y excelente para barbacoas y reuniones. En la planta superior se encuentran dos amplios dormitorios con todos los pisos nuevos. El baño es completamente nuevo con bañera nueva, marco de azulejos subterráneos, tocador nuevo y moderno y accesorios nuevos en todas partes. El sótano tiene una lavadora y una secadora nuevas, además de mucho espacio de almacenamiento. Proximidad al centro comercial 29th Street y varias líneas de autobús al centro de la ciudad. A corta distancia de los servicios de Fairmount Park, como canchas de tenis, áreas de juegos para niños, campos de béisbol y áreas recreativas. Se admiten mascotas con cargo mensual adicional. Los inquilinos pagan todos los servicios públicos. Primero/Último/SD vence antes de la mudanza.
